content: this top is perfect for summer weather and super easy to make created using a cotton mix yarn it is surely to become your favorite thing to wear to beat the heat the pattern is easy and beginner friendly and is made-to-measure which means it will fit your body exactly the way you want this top is created by working in a round and then creating the straps separately the length width of the top are adjustable as well as the length of the ruffles at the top also adjustable the stitches used are basic and simple therefore making this the perfect beginner friendly free crochet pattern
